Class ProductDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.onlineshop.dao.AbstractDAO<Product>

  • public class ProductDAO
extends AbstractDAO<Product>

      • isProductExists

        public boolean isProductExists(java.lang.String nameProduct,
                               java.lang.String type,
                               java.lang.String brand,
                               java.lang.String taste)
                        throws DaoException
        Parameters:
        nameProduct - nameProduct parameter - first part of composite search key.
        type - type parameter - second part of composite search key.
        brand - brand parameter - third part of composite search key.
        taste - taste parameter - fourth part of composite search key.
        Returns:
        true if in the table there are products by parameters: nameProduct, type, brand and taste and false of otherwise.
        Throws:
        DaoException - exception which occurs when an error in sql.
